comments:
I20070320-0010

File->New->Plug in development->Update site project
Give the project a name and accept defaults for everything else.
Hit Finish

Right click on site.xml, select PDE Tools/Build Site

An exception message is added to the error log.

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0

let's fix this one in 3.3M7.  It only happens when you try to build a site with no information and hopefully people won't run across it too often.
I agree, that's why I set the severity at minor.

Created an attachment (id=61749)
org.eclipse.pde.ui.patch

saving patch for M7
patch is smart and disables the menu entry if there are no features and some other things.
